Package cps.mouradalpha.interfaces

Interface SubscriptionImplementationI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ManagementCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Broker, ConnectorManagementCI, InBoundPortManagement, OutBoundPortManagement, SubscriberPlugin
    public interface SubscriptionImplementationI
    The interface SubscriptionImplementationI defines the methods that allows to a Subscriber to subscribe for a topic.
    Author:
    Mourad TOUATI / Alpha Issiaga DIALLO

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void modifyFilter​(java.lang.String topic, MessageFilterI newFilter, java.lang.String inboundPortURI)

      subscription for a specific topics

      subscription for a specific topics with a filter
      void subscribe​(java.lang.String topic, java.lang.String inboundPortURI)
      subscription for a specific topic
      void unsubscribe​(java.lang.String topic, java.lang.String inboundPortURI)
      unsubscribe for a topic so that the subscriber don't receive the messages for this topic anymore
